content.raw:
fixed links:

* [homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/413/)
* [trusty nvidia](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/412/)

it looks like homebrew has a [warning](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/413/warnings7Result/new/) and some failures of the examples build tests.

All the ubuntu builds are failing to find qt components in cmake:
~~~
CMake Error at /usr/share/cmake-2.8/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:108 (message):
  Could NOT find Qt4 (missing: QT_QTWEBKIT_INCLUDE_DIR QT_QTWEBKIT_LIBRARY)
  (found version "4.8.6")
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /usr/share/cmake-2.8/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:315 (_FPHSA_FAILURE_MESSAGE)
  /usr/share/cmake-2.8/Modules/FindQt4.cmake:1393 (FIND_PACKAGE_HANDLE_STANDARD_ARGS)
  cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake:491 (find_package)
  CMakeLists.txt:124 (include)
~~~
content.html:
fixed links:

  • homebrew
  • trusty nvidia

it looks like homebrew has a warning and some failures of the examples build tests.

All the ubuntu builds are failing to find qt components in cmake:

CMake Error at /usr/share/cmake-2.8/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:108 (message):
  Could NOT find Qt4 (missing: QT_QTWEBKIT_INCLUDE_DIR QT_QTWEBKIT_LIBRARY)
  (found version "4.8.6")
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /usr/share/cmake-2.8/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:315 (_FPHSA_FAILURE_MESSAGE)
  /usr/share/cmake-2.8/Modules/FindQt4.cmake:1393 (FIND_PACKAGE_HANDLE_STANDARD_ARGS)
  cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake:491 (find_package)
  CMakeLists.txt:124 (include)
